content:
ACT
174.  
Preparation of draft certificate
A notary may prepare first the draft succession certificate, certificate of legatee, certificate of recipient of compulsory portion or certificate of executor of will and set a later term for authenticating the certificate.
A notary shall authenticate a certificate according to the prior draft in the case specified in subsection 1 of this section if the notary does not receive a court ruling prohibiting the authentication of the certificate by the date of authentication of the certificate.
